items.title: CFB PREDICTIONS: Staff picks for Notre Dame VS USC
items.summary: The Notre Dame Fighting Irish are climbing up the rankings and are now ranked #13 in the country following their 36-7 win over NC State. The Irish will host #20 USC in the Battle for the Jeweled Shilellagh. Much has been made this week about the future of the seris, the incoming rain bomb, and […]

items.title: Notre Dame Football: USC Trojans Q&A with Michael Muto from “Untitled Notre Dame USC Podcast”
items.summary: Folks, it’s finally here. After that tough first two games of the season, we all quietly said the same thing to ourselves: the Playoff is still possible, but the Irish now need to win out — but for now, let’s just focus on winning the rest until we get to that USC Trojans matchup in […]

items.title: Throwback Thursday: Notre Dame Fighting Irish Football VS USC, 1989
items.summary: Few rivalries in college football capture the pageantry, pride, and pure emotion quite like Notre Dame vs. USC. Every meeting between these two storied programs feels like a chapter in an epic novel—written in gold helmets and cardinal jerseys, under bright lights and brighter expectations. The 1989 showdown in South Bend was no exception. It […]

items.title: EARNED 5-STAR PODCAST: It’s Notre Dame VS USC and we’re ready to roll
items.summary: Joshua, Jude, and Brendan are back to give you the best (delayed) Notre Dame football pod around. In this episode: And much more weaved in and out of the show. Please RATE and REVIEW! All reviews left on Apple Podcasts will be read on the next Earned 5-Star Podcast. Go Irish!

items.title: 2025 Notre Dame Football: Irish VS Southern Cal
items.summary: It’s mid-October during an odd year, so that means we get all of the majesty of a Midwestern autumn, as well as another round of Notre Dame versus USC. The Battle for the Jeweled Shillelagh is upon us, and it might be the last one for some time. While Marcus Freeman remains confident that the […]
